For this example I will be pulling data from a kaggle competition using my kaggle API

```{bash}
ls -l
```

```{bash}
pip install kaggle
```

```{bash}
kaggle competitions download -c forest-cover-type-prediction
```

```{bash}
unzip train.csv.zip 
unzip test.csv.zip 
```

```{bash}
mv sampleSubmission.csv.zip ../data/raw
mv test.csv.zip ../data/raw
mv train.csv.zip ../data/raw
mv train.csv ../data/raw
mv test.csv ../data/raw

```

```{bash}
chmod 666 ../data/raw/train.csv
chmod 666 ../data/raw/test.csv
```


```{bash}
head -n 2 ../data/raw/*.csv
```
